channel.title: Posts on Rossa Smallman
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Rossa Smallman

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Beginning my Journey I’ve always been interested in computers & technology; the world of video gaming introduced me to the wonders of tech from a very young age, I yet still remember the day me and my brother sat down in front of his Playstation 2, to play the newly released ‘Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas’, and I remember thinking it was a marvel, a completely digital world? Filled with people, places, and things to do?
